attributes.action: get selcuk to the uk to be with his family
attributes.additional_details: selcuk lives in turkey and has been refused a visa to come and live with his wife and children he has already missed the birth of his daughter and sees her only if and when leanne can go over there . This is not fair anyone that knows them knows they are  a couple in love not a scam for a visa . they have been apart for  to long now leanne lived in turkey for 3 years were she met and married selcuk so why is it that to return to her own country she has to leave her husband behind please  help us get him here .
